t: Is Walmart Paint Quality Paint? | ThriftyFun
s: Glidden, Behr, Valspro, Kilz, name brand is the same it doesnt matter where you buy it from, you just save a little more money. ... I dont know about Walmarts color splash, but what I can tell you is when looking for paint, try to get one that also has a primer in it, and check to see what rooms are recommended. ... Painted two rooms last year with paint from Walmart. The placesÂ ...
